element.definition: WADO-RS URL to retrieve the series. Note that this URL retrieves all SOP instances of the series not only those in the selection.
element.comments: Series level locator information is optional. If provided, this is the URL to retrieve the entire series with WADO-RS interaction, though only a subset of these are selected in the selection.
element.requirements: WADO-RS URL enables retrieval of the entire series using DICOM WADO-RS API.
